title: Detox your skin post the Diwali indulgence
text: You looked your best over the weekend with gorgeous makeup on and partied hard, indulged in sweets and stayed up late at night, but now your skin needs a break. Here’s how to detox your skin and bring back that glow:Eliminating toxins from your body will automatically add a glow to your face. Ditch coffee for a warm cup of green tea mixed with ginger or lemon to increase fat oxidation and eliminate excess levels of water from the body. You can also start your day with lemon juice mixed with warm water to flush the system.
description: If your skin has lost its glow, you can blame the pollution during Diwali, hectic schedules and bingeing on festive treats. Here’s how to bring back the glow
